Utterance: Hello there. Ami Dr. Betty. Ami ekhane notun GP. Prothome, apni amake ki dakben seta bolen?

Okay, thik ache. Okay, so, Barbara, ami ajke apnake dekhte esechhi. Kintu ami mone kori apni usually Dr. Brown er sathe dekha koren, tai na?
Haan. Dr. Brown amar doctor.

Well, ami amar pet er problem niye esechhi. Amar stomach e khub baje somossa hocche. Ar Dr. Brown kichhu ekta thik korte parchhen na. Tai ami vablam apnar sathe dekha kori dekhi apni ki help korte paren.

Umm, well, ami ei terrible discomfort anek somoy feel kori. Prayi somoy pet bhorti lage. Ami constipated hoye jai, ar tarpor abar diarrhea hoy. Mone hoy cramping feelings, ar sometimes pet e betha hoy, real stabbing feeling. Prayi somoy toilet e jete ichha kore, ar khub smelly wind pass kori.
So onek gulo symptoms aache, ar kichhu apnar kache beshi troublesome mone hocche.

Well, Dr. Brown amake shuru te kichhu muscle relaxants diye chhilen. Kintu ami health shop e giye onek help peyechhi. Tader theke onek different tablets and medicines peyechhi different things er jonno. Ar oh, Imodium, ami shob somoy amar handbag e rakhi, just in case, thik ache.

Gastroscopy?

Okay.
Kintu ami mone kori Dr. Brown enough tests koreni, karon tarpor theke uni bollo je kichhu paini. Ar uni ar kono test pathaini. Ekhon uni mone kore shesh, amake abar doctor er kache pathiye diyeche.

Right.
Jodi amar ektu beshi taka thakto, ami private e jeto. Ami mone kori uni problem er bottom e pounchate paren ni.
Tai apni mone koren je actually enough kichhu kora hoy ni.

Mone hocche apnar ei problems gulo chhar bochor dhore aache, stomach e onek gulo symptoms aache. Apni onek rokom tablets try korechen, kichhu prescribed, kichhu herbal remedies, ar kichhu tests o korechen, kintu apni mone koren je apni thoroughly enough investigate kora hoini. Eta ki thik?
Haan.

Well, eta quite boro impact koreche. Mone hoy boro jinish holo, ami full time theke part time e chole gechi kaj e. Ami sara din comfortably boshte partam na. Ar part time e giye, ek bochor aage ami kaj e chole gechi. Ami miss kori. Ami miss kori meyeder, amra at least ekbar week e raat e cinema ba drink e jeto. Eta ekta jinish.
Eta ki apni enjoy korechhen.

Ami swing in shape e jeto. Ami exercise class e jeto, ami miss kori exercise ta. Eta weekly chhilo, kintu mone hoy ami comfortable feel kori ni. Always worried chhilam je ami short nite parbo. Tai ami stop kore diye.

Then well, amar husband and ami dinner korte jetam. ajkal ar seta hoi na. eguloi shudhu.

Hmm, thik ache.

Well, ami bari te ghure berai. Hoi to ektu beshi somoy television dekhe katayi. Daytime television e ami ektu addicted hoye gechi, bolte gele. Ektu purono magazine o pori, kintu mooloto ami bari tei thaki.

Gato bochhor amar chele biye koreche. Ar ami worried chhilam je ami cope up korte parbo ki na, bhalo feel korbo ki na. Kintu ashcharyajonok vabe, ami besh bhalo form e chhilam. Mone hoy garmi te tin saptah ready hoye wedding er somoy, kintu ami besh bhalo form e chhilam. Haan, seta bhalo somoy chhilo.
Right. Ar apni amake bolun to, oi somoy apnar symptoms kemon chhilo?
Ami hardly notice korechi. Haan. Mone hoy shob clear hoye geche.
Sundor.
Eta valo chilo.

Ekhon ami ekta kharap patch er moddhe achi. Eta besh uncomfortable. Ami bolte pari, amar husband jabar somoy ami notice kori. Se, se tar job er jonno travel kore, ar se ek mash e dui bar jabar hote pare. Ar seta beshi valo lage na, bolte pari.
Mane tumi notice koro je tumar husband na thakle beshi kharap lage.
Hote pare ami beshi bhabchi jokhon se ashe na.

Ar tumi nijer theke ki kono vabna niyeche je ki karon hote pare?

Mane, ami vabechilam hote pare eta ekta infection chilo je clear hoini early stages e. Kintu ami mone kori, mone kori hote pare eta IBS, amar ek friend er ache, ar seta similar shonay. Ar kichu somoy ami vabchi hote pare eta ekta ulcer, ar khub kharap din e ami vabchi hote pare cancer.
Thik ache.

Amar shashuri maa gato bochor cancer e mara gechen, tini ekta growth niye chilen, doctor investigate koreni, ar jokhon paoa gelo, seta football er size er moto chilo, ar operate kora too late hoye gechilo. Tai jokhon ami raat e bichanay jai, ami feel kori ar make sure kori je kichu different hocche na. Ar haan, ami worry kori ei niye.
Mane tumi raat e nijer body feel koro, dekho je kichu feel korte paro ki na.
Haan. Ami shudhu make sure korte chai je kichu change hocche na oikhane.

Thik ache. Thik ache. Mane ami shudhu make sure korte chai je ami golpo ta thik bujhechi. Ami ki golpo ta thik bujhechi?
Haan.

Mane, ami vabechilam, tumi ekta notun doctor ekhane, ar tumi medical training shesh korecho. Ami vabechilam hote pare notun chokh diye, notun upay diye problem ta dekhte paro. Tumi hote pare notun test er somporke jano, je amar doctor janto na, notun development gulo, je tumi amake different test er jonno pathate paro.
Thik ache. Mane tumi asha korchile ami tomay aro test er jonno pathabo?
Hmm. Mane, ami mone kori, kichu ache je test e reveal hote pare.

Thik ache. Mane, Barbara, ami tomay shunte peye, ar tomay symptoms niye shunte peye, ami mone kori ekhon aro test pathano tomay jonne most useful hobe na. Na, ami mone kori tumi clearly pain feel koro. Ar clearly tomay onek physical symptoms ache, ar seta clearly tomay jibone badha dey ar disability create kore. Ami bolchi na je pain ta tomay mind e ache. Ami bolchi je mone hoy amader feel kora ar amader jibon kemon cholche, seta impact korte pare amader symptoms notice kora te. Ami vabchi, hote pare amader ekhon dorkar tomay jibon niye ki koro, ar tomay din niye ki koro, seta niye bhaba. Ar hote pare kichu pleasurable jinish gulo abar try kora. Ami tablets niyeo vabchi je tumi ney, ar mone hoy tumi onek ney, ar ami vabchi hote pare amader boshe dekha uchit, ar hote pare rationalize kora uchit, ar decide kora uchit kon gulo tomay help kore, kon gulo kichu kore na, ar kon gulo hote pare tomay symptoms kharap kore. Dui, tin mash onek lomba somoy, jodi kichu hocche, mane, seta holo amar shashuri maa er sathe, ora ora take chhere diyeche, ar spot korte pareni.

Jodi same thake, tahole amra pretty clear hote parbo je kichu new hocche na je amra miss korchhi. Eta ki shonay?
